hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
[ -e ~/bin/update_automation ] || wget -O ~/bin/update_automation https://raw.github.com/SUSE-Cloud/automation/master/scripts/jenkins/update_automation && chmod a+x ~/bin/update_automation # fetch the latest automation updates update_automation jenkins-job-trigger openstack_test_on_fresh_vm
if [[ $openstack_version =~ "develcloud" ]] ; then cloudsource=$openstack_version else cloudsource=openstack$openstack_version fi
#DevelCloudHead=false #OSHEAD=
set -x . openstack_test_on_fresh_vm startvm
# collection of patches not applied yet (bnc#807540) # rsync -av /home/jenkins/files2vm/* root@$ip:
runtest
# mappings for submit job trigger OSversion=`echo $openstack_version | perl -ne 'print ucfirst($_)'` case $OSversion in develcloud2.0) project=Devel:Cloud:2.0 subproject=Staging ;; develcloud1.0) project=Devel:Cloud:1.0 subproject=OpenStack ;; *) echo "No valid project defined." exit 1 esac
# trigger submit job echo "triggering cloud-submit-project..." jenkins-job-trigger cloud-submit-project -p project=$project subproject=$subproject
